Packages 
Package Description
coupon.sys.core.beans
This package all the classes in project The classes are: Company, Customer, Coupon and one Enum class of Coupon Type
coupon.sys.core.configuration
At this configuration Package there are properties which commonly used in the program.
coupon.sys.core.connection
This package handle connection in the system.
coupon.sys.core.coupon.system
This package handle one singelton class which provides one instance of the system.
coupon.sys.core.dao
This pachage defines all the Dao (Data Access Object) intefaces for the coupon system.
coupon.sys.core.dao.db
This package holds a concrete classes - implementations of all the methods of the abstract classes.
coupon.sys.core.dao.db.utils
At this package a general and supporting methods are implemented:
1.Emailing Process package - holds method that build and sends an email to the administrator every 24 hours
2.GeneralMethods package - has one method wich generate the current date without the time
3.TableBuilder package - has one method that build a table with all the deleted coupons
coupon.sys.core.exceptions
This package defines the exceptions in the system.
By default there is one general exception ("CouponSystemException") which is thrown with the original exception as parameter
coupon.sys.core.facade
This package contains 1 abstract class called "Client Facade" and 3 concrete classes that should have implemented the login method in the ClientFacade class.
Since the login method was implemented in CompanyDaoDb and in the CustomerDaoDb this class is irrelevant
coupon.sys.core.sub.processes
This package has one class that responsibale for the Coupon Expiration thread
coupon.sys.mainTest
This package contains collaborative tests.
It has 7 threads that run together and test all the methods and the connection pool.
It has:
1.
coupon.sys.mainTestByRole
This package contains tests file according to Roles
1.
dbCreation
This package has two classes one for the creation of the database and the other one is for cleaning the db before the tests phase
